results.title: Senior Java Software Engineer
results.description:
47 Degrees, a global consulting firm specializing in functional programming, is always on the lookout for talented Software Engineers to lead and nurture projects involving Scala, Java and other technologies in the Engineering and Big Data space.

Outside of our client-facing projects, open-source projects, we are heavily invested in sharing knowledge through the 47 Degrees Academy. Additionally, as part of our commitment to the community, 47 Degrees organizes Lambda World, a non-profit, bi-annual Functional Programming conference held in Cadiz, Spain, and Seattle, WA, as well as the largest Scala Meetup in the Pacific Northwest, Scala at the Sea.

47 Degrees Engineers:

  • Work with a wide variety of clients around the world in various business sectors on exciting, value added projects.
  • Create, test and provide best practices to design, build and maintain scalable, reliable, and robust solutions.
  • Help onboard and mentor new engineers for clients and internal teams where necessary.
  • Have plenty of opportunities to share their knowledge and engage with the community at meet-ups and events around the world.
  • Work in an agile development environment.

Requirements:

  • 5+ years of professional software development experience.
  • Proficiency in server-side programming languages, especially Java.
  • Proven experience in cloud application architecture and engineering, AWS is preferred.
  • Professional experience with Java-based web services, RESTful framework, and both relational and non-relational database platforms.
  • Experience with large-scale distributed system architecture.
  • Ability to trace through various services and determine root causes when issues occur.
  • Knowledge of common performance issues, as well as  working experience with logs and monitoring tools.
  • Familiarity with CI/CD methodologies.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
  • Strong teamwork ethic, with demonstrated ability to work independently as well as a team-focused approach towards software development.

Experience with some, or all of the following technology is essential:

  • Java, Kotlin
  • Spring Boot
  • RESTful API
  • Amazon DynamoDB
  • MySQL
  • TestNG
  • Docker
  • Maven
  • Jenkins
  • GitLab/GitHub
  • AWS, including CloudFormation

What you can expect from us:

This role includes the flexibility to work remotely in the United States or from the Seattle office. Here's what you can expect from us:

  • A competitive salary
  • Top tier medical, dental, and vision insurance with 100% employee and 50% dependent premiums paid by Company
  • 401k with up to 4% company match
  • Generous paid family and medical leave
  • Continuous education support with access to training courses on the 47 Degrees Academy Platform
  • Employee Referral Program
  • Wellbeing and Reward Platform
  • All the tools you need including a MacBook, Monitor, Mouse, and Keyboard

You can also expect support from leadership and your colleagues, we love seeing our own succeed and we'll do what we can to foster your growth and creativity. This is an exciting opportunity with a fast-growing, cutting-edge company.

47 Degrees is committed to creating an inclusive and diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.

Please feel free to share your preferred pronouns with us during the application process.

47 Degrees does not sponsor work visas, either at the time of hire or at any later time. All persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States, and to complete any required employment eligibility forms.

results.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
results.description:
We are looking to recruit a senior and mid-level, permanent Full Stack Developer who will be a key member in the applications team alongside other full-stack and front-end developers, providing fundamental input and knowledge in solving some of these challenges. This would suit someone with demonstrable technical expertise who is driven by a hands-on and stimulating role.

This will be a full-time permanent role, with the flexibility to work from home.

Key Responsibilities

  • Working closely with the Technical Lead and other developers in the team
  • Delivering high quality, scalable, and proficient submissions to the codebase
  • Managing multiple projects simultaneously, drawing on extensive knowledge in front-end and back-end development
  • Liaising with clients and key stakeholders – the ability to communicate effectively from a non-technical perspective is crucial
  • Suggesting and developing creative solutions, contributing to this advanced technical field

Requirements

  • Strong academics are desirable but not a pre-requisite
  • Ideally circa 5 years’ experience as a full stack developer, with reasonable experience in working on greenfield projects
  • You must be comfortable with the following technologies: Node.js, React, React Hooks, AWS (Cognito & Serverless), graphQL, REST API’s, Third Party API integration, Micro Services, Mongo / DynamoDB / NoSQL, SQL, CI/CD

It would be desirable to have commercial Blockchain experience (but not a must have), such as:

  • Smart Contracts – including ERC-20 and ERC-721 and wrapped contracts, IPFS, Handling Metadata and Order Book Management / DEX experience.
  • Ethereum Blockchain – including Geth, Truffle, Solidity, Ganache, 0x Protocol, Infura

Benefits

  • Competitive salary on offer, dependent on the level of experience and skills
  • Work in a dynamic and fast-paced environment with new challenges
  • A forward-thinking business with a solutions-oriented approach and focus on getting things done
  • A collaborative, agile team who are passionate about their work
  • Get involved in a variety of projects, see how they develop into polished products and services

results.title: Software Engineer
results.description:
Company Overview
Encoura is transforming the way students connect with opportunities as they move through high school into post-secondary opportunities. Our mission is to empower students and institutions to create meaningful connections so students can make the most informed decisions to achieve their goals. Most recently, the company has evolved its product technology stack and services to better address the future path of students enabling easy connectivity to their opportunities.

Our Encoura platform provides custom technology solutions that combine Eduventures’ research, data science, strategic enrolment and multichannel marketing services to over 2,000 higher ed institutions. The company also offers the Encourage™ mobile app for students—the nation’s largest free college and career planning program used by millions of high school students and educators nationwide.


Role Overview
Encoura’s success is directly a function of talent. We are serious about hiring the best talent possible in creating our crew that is incredibly passionate and dedicated to building the next-gen ecosystem of systems and products that will improve the student experience across the entire college and career planning lifecycle.

We are looking for an experienced hands-on Software Engineer to join a small, distributed team of engineers. You’ll work closely with Engineering and Product Leadership as you build your craft alongside other developers in small scrum teams. You will bring a continuous improvement mentality to the role, always on the lookout for ways to make things better across the company and within your own scope of responsibility.


A day in the Life of a Software Engineer
  • Working with Engineering and Product Team leads, propel the team through agile development of web apps, mobile apps, libraries, and frameworks, connecting with graphQL microservices.
  • As a Software Engineer, you’ll be very involved in the overall design of the system you’re working on while learning our existing technical stacks.
  • Collaborate within your team while attending grooming sessions and assisting others as needed to move the team forward.
  • Promote a work environment that is highly collaborative and team-centric.
  • Enhance, refactor, and continuously improve the codebase.
  • Keep management informed of project progress and problems, particularly as to needed changes in schedule, resources, or product scope.
  • Communicate effectively with technical and non-technical people.


Role Progression
  • In your 1st month, you will be learning about our business, processes, and recommended tech stack. You will immediately be working hands-on with our technology and getting to know your team.
  • Within 3 months, you will be participating in planning & development activities and beginning to look at infrastructure designs, CI/CD pipelines and carrying out code reviews for the team.
  • Within 6 months you should be taking ownership of the application architecture, production troubleshooting, working on cross-portfolio projects and releasing software with the team.
  • Within 1 year you will be fully immersed in the SDLC, providing technical assistance to your team and building bulletproof products while actively engaging in process optimization.


About you
  • You hold a BS in Computer Science, Computer Information Systems, or equivalent work experience. A relevant Master’s degree is a plus.
  • You have 2+ years experience building software applications understanding the full scope of the app including the front and back- end topology.
  • You have 2+ years experience working with Microsoft’s .NET stack to develop web and system applications.
  • You are experience with Docker and setting up local dev environments.
  • You have a presence on Github with your own portfolio of projects to share and demonstrate.
  • You’ve worked with a technology stack similar to ours: AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Linux, macOS, Windows, PostgreSQL, MS SQL Server, Redis, ElasticSearch, MongoDB, Javascript, ReactJS, NodeJS, Python, DataDog, GitHub, JIRA and Confluence.
  • You’re used to working in an iterative-based development environment using Agile/Scrum/Sprints.
  • Experience working with GraphQL (Apollo), NodeJS and preferably using a framework such as NestJS a plus.
  • Experience building web applications with React, Material UI, NextJS, and Typescript a plus.
  • You are always thinking, “what happens if this fails?”
  • You are opinionated about software architecture.
  • You’re an excellent, collaborative team player with the communication skills to match.
  • You are passionate about getting the job done well even under time pressure and thrive in a demanding environment.
  • Demonstrated proactivity in capitalizing on opportunities and resolving issues.
  • Intellectually curious – prepared to challenge and be challenged.
  • Constantly striving to learn new technologies and look for ways to stay up to date in this rapidly changing industry.


What sets us apart?
  • Mission driven culture
  • Paid holidays and generous PTO policy
  • Generous benefits: Medical, Dental, Vision, Paid Life and Disability, HSA, FSA,
  • Tuition Reimbursement, and 401k
  • Casual dress
  • Collaborative and energetic work environment with other motivated, career-driven professionals

results.title: Android Developer
results.description:
We are looking for Jr/Sr level Android Developers who possess a passion for pushing mobile technologies to the limits. As an android developer, you will work with our team of talented engineers to design and build the next generation of our mobile applications. Android programming works closely with other app development and technical teams. #LI-Remote


Responsibilities
  • Develop product specific features that help the application grow its user base, provide multiple monetization sources, and increase user retention.
  • Implement MVP features and A/B tests in a fast-paced timeline to determine and measure user engagement.
  • Maintain Android Launcher project and optimize system features accordingly with new Android system updates (Android 10, 11)
  • Develop and collaborate with cross-functional teams to define the core structure of our products suite with daily contribution to the business needs. From adding new features, maintaining and optimizing existing functionality, to enhancing user experience and feasibility to use our products.
  • Monitor product's analytics and improve application's performance.
  • Handle bug fixing and maintain application within 0.3% crash free rate.
  • Work with third-party data sources, libraries and APIs.
  • Estimate development timelines and collaborate on building a roadmap for product growth.

Requirements

  • At least 1 year of experience of professional Android development experience
  • Knowledge of Kotlin,and/or Java, and MVVM
  • Excitement to work in a lean and fast-paced environment where you invent, maintain, and scale out both new and existing high-volume and high-quality mobile applications.
  • Knowledge of UI/UX, and hands on experience designing UI a huge plus.
  • Experience building applications in online advertising, or similar fields is a bonus.
  • Google Play Billing experience preferred.

results.title: Developer Advocate
results.description:
WalletConnect is the web3 communications protocol. Since our founding in 2018, we have empowered endless connections between wallets and apps, linking the web3 ecosystem together and fueling brand-new user experiences. We began with a single API and are now pushing the boundaries of wallet technology to build up a suite of APIs, all with our signature agnosticism (any wallet, any app, any chain). In March 2022, we raised our $11M Series A from USV, 1kx, Coinbase and other leading investors, and are looking to grow.

To learn more about our plans to create a multi-API messaging network for web3, take a look at our presentation at EthCC.


The Role

We're looking for an experienced developer advocate that is as passionate about empowering developers as we are. You will play a key role in growing and educating our developer community and help them discover, implement, and succeed with our APIs. By collaborating with product, engineering, and marketing, you will help define WalletConnect's broader strategy, serving as the bridge between our developer audience and internal teams.

Requirements

Responsibilities:

  • Represent WalletConnect in the developer community as a regular attendee and speaker at meet-ups, conferences, and events
  • Create engaging social content to drive education and adoption among developers, such as tutorials, demo apps, explainer videos, and other technical articles
  • Be able to answer community questions, speak with developers, and support integration partners
  • Represent the developer community externally and internally, shaping WalletConnect's strategy and roadmap with your insights
  • Serve as a technical advisor to non-engineering functions

Must have:

  • Proven knowledge and experiences within web3 / blockchain
  • Confidence with popular programming languages and some experience with one or more of web3's relevant technologies
  • Excellent written English communication skills
  • Outstanding public speaking, content creation (especially YouTube), and presentation skills
  • Strong Twitter presence and following
  • Prior experience in developer relations or similar roles highly desirable

Benefits

What WalletConnect offers:

  • Fully remote position
  • Competitive salary
  • Remote work allowance
  • Company equity
  • Token offering

results.title: Full-stack engineer in FemTech startup
results.description:
You will work very closely with our Product Management and Founder team to enhance and grow our existing technical platform. You will play an integral role in shaping our product, culture, technology, ways of working and future team. You will develop end-to-end product solutions for our customer-facing experiences as well as internal tools.

Aura seeks a Full Stack developer, with 5-7 years of software development experience, who can lead the development process through developing, testing and deploying improvements to our existing Aura platform.

You are ambitious and are looking for an advancement opportunity in an early-stage startup. You are able to work with Product and Designs teams and enjoy contributing to the product’s roadmap, assessing complexity and raising technical needs.

You have experience in the end-to-end software development lifecycle and in a range of technologies, from backend infrastructure such as AWS, relational database systems and APIs development. You also have experience in web-based technologies such as flutter and wordpress, and in-depth knowledge of core programming languages such as python.

This position is suited to a hands-on senior developer who knows how to grow a solid tech team and to choose technology. Ideally, the candidate will come from the Health-Tech industry.

 

Technologies involved in Aura Fertility

  • Flutter, Dart, Firebase (Aura API, AWS), MySQL and MongoDB, Python Flask Docker, Wordpress Integration, Vimeo Integration

 

Key duties

  • The hire will join the founding team of Aura and be responsible for supporting, developing, testing and releasing our current mobile app and ecosystem based on client needs and business strategy
  • At start the position will be a development hands on position with the prospect of creating and building a development team.
  • Support the Product Roadmap and develop the technical strategy that will make the product vision a reality
  • Make architecture decisions to ensure a strong, stable, and scalable product
  • Work with the Senior Management team and support shaping the product vision and finding the best ways to make it happen, turning it into a working solution
  • Establishing a test automation framework

Requirements

 

  • Hands-on experience as a Senior Full-Stack developer (including Dev Ops)
  • Previous tech startup experience and strong track record
  • Experience with some of the technologies of our stack and the capability to learn new modern programming languages and tech
  • Experience enabling Product related decisions and supporting the realisation of the company's product roadmap
  • Data driven in your decision making
  • Strong understanding and awareness of data security and compliance
  • Experience in unit, integration and regression testing
  • Experience working with Agile methodologies
  • Experience managing remote teams and working with remote peers/teams
  • Exceptional interpersonal and collaboration skills
  • Ability to communicate technical concepts to all levels, and to collaborate with a range of stakeholders
  • Strategy focus and ability to future-proof innovations
  • Ideally experience working on AI / ML related projects

Benefits

  • Flat hierarchies, where you work directly with the founders
  • A dynamic environment with a “get things done” mentality
  • International and talented team of start-up professionals
  • Work with trailblazing female founders at the cutting edge of FemTech innovation
  • Have a big impact on our customer, supporting real people through IVF
  • Opportunity to strongly impact and shape the future of a fast-growing company
  • Be at the beating heart of a start up - inputting on strategy and product execution
  • Make a meaningful difference to a purpose-led female-focused social business
  • Drive tech decisions and help build out a team
  • Lots of autonomy and self-directed working style
  • Remote-working with weekly team meetings + monthly in person strategy days
  • 25 days vacation + UK bank holidays
  • Potential for equity stake on successful advancement
  • Flexible working hours
